<!-- Example -->
#### Example 3.1 

$y = |x|$

\begin{align}
  (x+1)^2
    &= \cssId{Step1}{(x+1)(x+1)}            \\[3px]
    &\cssId{Step2}{{} = x(x+1) + 1(x+1)}    \\[3px]
    &\cssId{Step3}{{} = (x^2+x) + (x+1)}    \\[3px]
    &\cssId{Step4}{{} = x^2 + (x + x) + 1}  \\[3px]
    &\cssId{Step5}{{} = x^2 + 2x + 1}
\end{align}
</p>

<p>
